com.percussion.utils.exceptions
Class PSBaseException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.percussion.utils.exceptions.PSBaseException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSAssemblyException, PSCatalogException, PSFilterException, PSPublisherException, PSSecurityException, PSSiteManagerException
public abstract class PSBaseException
extends Exception

Abstract base class to handle loading exception messages and formatting message strings, handling arguments and using error codes as keys to the bundle. Derived exception classes need to implement getResourceBundleBaseName() to provide the bundle class name or fully qualified properties file name.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

PSBaseException

public PSBaseException(int msgCode,
                       Object... arrayArgs)
Construct an exception for messages taking an array of arguments. Be sure to store the arguments in the correct order in the array, where {0} in the string is array element 0, etc.

Parameters:
msgCode - The code of the error string to load.
arrayArgs - The array of arguments to use as the arguments in the error message. May be null, and may contain null elements.

PSBaseException

public PSBaseException(int msgCode)
Construct an exception for messages taking no arguments.

Parameters:
msgCode - The error string to load.

PSBaseException

public PSBaseException(int msgCode,
                       Throwable cause,
                       Object... arrayArgs)
Same as PSBaseException(int, Object...) but takes one additional parameter to indicate the exception that caused this exception.

Parameters:
msgCode - The code of the error string to load.
cause - The original exception that caused this exception to be thrown, may be null.
arrayArgs - The array of arguments to use as the arguments in the error message. May be null, and may contain null elements.
Method Detail

getLocalizedMessage

public String getLocalizedMessage(Locale locale)
Returns the localized detail message of this exception.

Parameters:
locale - The locale to generate the message in. If null , the default locale is used.
Returns:
The localized detail message, never null, may be empty.

getStackTraceAsString

public static String getStackTraceAsString(Throwable t)
Get the stack trace for the specified exception as a string.

Parameters:
t - The throwable (usually an exception), never null.

getErrorText

public String getErrorText(int code,
                           boolean nullNotFound,
                           Locale loc)
Get the error text associated with the specified error code.

Parameters:
code - The error code.
nullNotFound - If true, return null if the error string is not found, if false, return the code as a string if the error string is not found.
loc - The locale to use, may be null, in which case the default locale is used.
Returns:
the error text, may be null or empty.

getResourceBundleBaseName

protected abstract String getResourceBundleBaseName()
Get the base name of the resource bundle, a fully qualified class name

Returns:
The base name of the resource bundle, never null or empty.
